summary: Two tops both with CBBE body mesh. Legs, ring cloth, gloves and tasset.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#00ffff][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700]Vox Armour Set

[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BeuUS1n7vys]New video:[/url][/color][/font]
[youtube]BeuUS1n7vys[/youtube]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffd966]Please note: Leather bodice (Lament) includes steel shoulders, is not corset style. The drop/window view item is simply as is for file size, sake.[/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][/size][/color]
[color=#ff00ff][size=5]
[/size][/color][/center][left][color=#ffff00][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#93c47d][size=5]This is a set that I spent many many hours and days completing. I hope you enjoy it![/size][/color][/font]
[/color][color=#ffd966]
[/color][color=#ffff00][color=#ffd966]
[/color][color=#ffff00][color=#ffff00][color=#ff7700][color=#00ffff][color=#ffd966][size=4]Can you use this with another body? [/size][/color] [color=#c9daf8][color=#00ffff][color=#fff2cc]As long as you wear either Argus/Lament chest piece,  you can use this with almost any body. Only issue. 'possible' visible neck or wrist seams.
[/color]
[/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][color=#ffd966][size=4]Contains:[/size][/color]
[color=#fff2cc]
[size=2]2 tops, both with the CBBE body mesh. (Curvy edition)   1 named Argus which is the peacock design and the other Lament which is more rustic.

Nevernude friendly as long as you put on one of the tops.

Any CBBE body friendly as long as you wear one of the two tops as it pops the curvy edition over your current choice.

Other parts included in set are full leg plates, ring cloth, gloves and tasset armor short pants[/size]

[size=4]All parts are enchantable and can be tempered at the work bench.[/size][/color]
[/color][color=#ffff00][color=#ffff00][color=#ff7700][color=#00ffff][color=#c9daf8][color=#00ffff]
[/color][/color][/color][/color][/color]
[color=#fff2cc][size=4]Edit:: You can find the parts under steel or use player.additem command .  Help Vox and Help Argus to get the item numbers.
  
What is that awesome bow in picture one you ask? [/size][/color][/color][color=#ffff00][color=#fff2cc][size=4]It is called the Huntsman by InsanitySorrow. Find it here::: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57870/?]Huntsman Bow[/url][/size][/color]
[color=#ff7700][color=#00ffff][color=#c9daf8]
[size=4]
[/size][color=#00ffff][color=#ffd966][size=4]Will I make other body variants?[/size][/color][color=#ffd966][size=4] [/size][/color] [color=#d0e0e3][color=#fff2cc]At this time, my plate is full with a lot going on in life and modding.[/color]
[color=#ffff00][size=4]
[/size][/color][color=#00ffff][color=#ffd966][size=4]Will permission be granted for conversions? [/size][/color][color=#fff2cc] [/color][color=#ffff00][color=#00ffff][color=#fff2cc]Contact me for permission. I will likely give permission on most requests for conversions. I am a woman modder so there are a few that I will straight out refuse. In other words, don't ask me if your request is for the triple X Y Z bust size. Other than that, feel free to contact me.
[/color]
[size=4][color=#ff00ff]Check out my other work and remember to Endorse if you like my stuff and vote if you Love it.
[/color][/size][color=#ffe599][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60090/?]Black Sun Serpent[/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61271/?] Black Widow Ninja[/url], [/size][/color][color=#fce5cd]
[/color][/color][color=#fce5cd][size=3]
Also, check out the Ritter conversion by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68518/?]AlpineYJ[/url]  male and female options along with recolors by Cald123.[/size][/color]

[color=#e69138][size=4]Permissions: Want to use this in another mod on another site, etc. You must contact me.[/size][/color]

[color=#fff2cc][size=4]If the response to this set seems positive enough, I will release a male conversion in the coming weeks.[/size][/color]

[size=4][color=#00ffff][color=#ffe599]Thanks to the modding Community, Nexus, Autodesk, Gimp, Nifskope, Caliente for the CBBE body and all the support of friends and family. Special Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1792897/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Cald123[/url] for his screen shot work of this outfit. Currently being used as the background image.[/color]

[color=#9900ff][color=#ff00ff][color=#e69138][size=5]Want to Watch?  [youtube]IKbCXvn22VE[/youtube]

Like the set? Post up some pictures. I would rather list user screenshots, than my own. And please comment if you like the set. Modders enjoy a happy comment or two.[/size][/color]
[/color][/color]

[/color][/size]


[/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color]
[/color][/left]
author: SagittariusMoon of Intracloud Productions

files.name: Vox Argus and Lament set CBBE
files.fileName: Vox Argus and Lament set CBBE-69441-1-0.7z
